action.action-desc: Mr. Banks (for himself, Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Waltz, and Mr. Lamborn) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To expand the prohibition on funding for international institutions of higher education that host Confucius Institutes and remove the authority to waive the prohibition.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Federal Funding for CCP Spying and Persuasion In Education Settings (SPIES) Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition on funding for international institutions of higher education that host Confucius Institutes and removal of waiver authority
section.text: Section 1062 of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (Public Law 116–283; 10 U.S.C. 2241 note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking Except as provided in subsection (b), none and inserting None; and
by inserting or international institution of higher education after institution of higher education;

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (c) and (d) as subsections (b) and (c), respectively.
